title: The Co-operative Republic of Guyana Act
title_en: The Co-operative Republic of Guyana Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-co-operative-republic-of-guyana-act | Legal areas: Citizenship and Nationality

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Co-operative Republic Shorttitle.
of Guyana Act.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. In this Act-                                                    Interpreta-
                                                                     tion.
    “commencement of this Act” means 23rd February,
        1971;
    “Minister” means the Minister responsible for external
        affairs;
    “Parliament” means the Parliament of Jamaica.

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3.-(1) On and after the commencement of this Act, all Operation
existing law, that is to say all law which, whether being a of
                                                            law.
                                                               existing
rule of law or a provision of an Act of Parliament or of any
other enactment or instrument whatsoever, is in force on the
date of such commencement or has been passed or made be-
fore that date and comes into force thereafter, shalli unless
and until provision to the contrary is made by Parliament
or some other authority having power in that behalf, and
subject to the following provisions of this section, have the
same operation in relation to the Co-operative Republic
of Guyana, and persons and things belonging to or con-
nected with the Co-operative Republic of Guyana, as it
would have apart from this subsection if Guyana had not
become a Co-operative Republic.
       (2) The Minister may, by order, make such adapta-
tions in any enactment passed before or after the com-
mencement of this Act, or in any instrument having effect
2            CO-OPERATIVE REPUBLIC OF GUYANA
    under any such enactment, as appear to him necessary or
    expedient in consequence of Guyana having become a Co-
    operative Republic, and any such order may, though made
    after the commencement of this Act, be made so as to
    have effect from the date of such commencement.
          (3) Every order made under subsection (2) shall be
    subject to negative resolution.
          me inclusion of this page is authorized by L.N. 480/1973]
